name: A Future Kid Robot Run & Gun Fight Game By Running Free & Fighting Games For Teen Boys And Kids Pro
name_original: A Future Kid Robot Run & Gun Fight Game By Running Free & Fighting Games For Teen Boys And Kids Pro
description:
+++ THIS IS YOUR FUTURE +++

------------------------------
1) Awesome Future Robots Game!!
2) Check out the screen shots and see for yourself
3) Compete against your friends
------------------------------

This game is so freakin' sweet! - Chase

Test your fighting skills in the difficult land and collect as many points as you can along the way!

HOW LONG CAN YOU LAST?

- Collect as many points as possible
- Compete against your friends for the Title!
- Unlock additional Robots!

Download now and compete to win!
